description: T1 - Himalayan Birch (Betual utilis jacquemontii)	Selectively remove some branches between 1 and 2m, as agreed with client.Selectively reduce mid/upper crown around 5m where it bulges over the lawn, as agreed with client. - Final Height - Unchanged at 14m - Final Spread - 6mT2 - Snake Bark Maple (Acer capillipes)	Remove limbs over lawn at 2 & 3 m	Services - Final Height - Unchanged at 6m - Final Spread - Unchanged at 4m T3 - Narrowleaf Firethorn (Pyracantha angustifolia)	Reduce height to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2-3m of new growth (retain screening to neighbours). Final Height - 3.5m - Final Spread - 2mT4 - Magnolia	Reduce/thin selected limbs/branches, as agreed with client.Thin by 10% - Final Height - Unchanged at 8m - Final Spread - Unchanged at 5mT5 - Walnut (Juglans regia)	Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 1m of new growth. Final height 5m and final overall spread 3.5m	T6 - Pittosporum	Reduce height by 1-1.5m - Final Height - 3.5m - Final Spread - Unchanged at 3mG7 - Mixed Species	Reduce overhang to drive by 1-2m - cutting to suitable growth points - Final Height - Unchanged at 10m - Final Spread - 6m
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
